summary: The TypeScript SDK is not reading the default environment configuration TOML file from the correct macOS path ($HOME/Library/Application Support/temporalio/temporal.toml), causing configuration loading to fail.
userImpact: Workers on macOS cannot load default environment configuration files, preventing users from using centralized configuration management on that platform.
rootCause: The TypeScript SDK is not correctly resolving the macOS Application Support directory path for environment configuration files.
resolutionDetails: The issue was confirmed to be a file path resolution problem in the SDK that was fixed to correctly use $HOME/Library/Application Support/temporalio/temporal.toml on macOS.
keyQuote: the SDKs should read the toml config file on a mac from $HOME/Library/Application Support/temporal/temporal.toml. However this path is not being read
